remarks: A sequence whose iteration function ignores the second argument is only affected by the first point of the initial value function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
algrf.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
algrf.2 $e |- R = seq M ( ( F o. 1st ) , ( Z X. { A } ) ) $.
seq1st $p |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ A e. V ) -> R = seq M ( ( F o. 1st ) , { <. M , A >. } ) ) $.
